text: trong chea anak del ban banhchouh pheap nungonr nowknong chetd robsa banda anak del mean chomnue( now thngai a l hou tei pi yah) daembi aoy puokke banthem nouv pheap mean chomnue ruom cheamuoynung chomnue robsa puokke themtiet . haey kangtp nei mekh cheachraen chean ning phendei kuchea kammosetthi robsa a l laoh . haey a l laoh mha doeng mha ktebandet
